Name: Alphard
Details: The capital of the Marian Hegemony, Alphard contained a germanium cache belonging in the Alphard Trading Company that was rediscovered in 2920 by Johann Sebastian O'Reilly, a LosTech prospector. The dry and arid world quickly industrialized and it houses the Hegemony's government, along with ATC's offices and the military industries of Marian Arms Incorporated.
